summary: An ordinance relating to the acquisition by condemnation of Lots 9 to 22, both inclusive, Block 1, and Lots 9 to 15, both inclusive, Block 2, Boetzke's University Addition, for Park and Playground purposes as an extension of the present University Playfield and providing that the entire cost of such acquisition shall be paid by assessment on the property specially benefited, or from such funds as may be provided by law or by both such assessment and from such funds.
